name: Ludum-Dare-Dressup
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 41

"The most fun you'll ever have for 2 minutes!"

~Ascmarhia Schmechkard

"This game.... {is so freaking}....  {Awesome }!!!!" 

~A genuine satisfied human person 2018

This game was made in a short amount of time..

Its more of a proof of concept but I put a lot of work and love into it.

I hope you get a small amount of joy from this.

I certainly did making it.
